meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Evidence</kanji> <kanji>traces</kanji> are little bits of <vocabulary>evidence</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>proof</vocabulary>, left behind. They're the <vocabulary>traces</vocabulary> that show that something happened.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
